content: sew them together where they touch red lines in the picture sew through the loop/two strings of the chain edge of each side for the front sew together two of the diamonds for the legs and the three inner triangles now sow the front panel to the back and the outer triangles and the hoods to the back as well the red lines are where you sew the front parts to the back the grey lines are already sewn in the previous steps to finish it you can add strings or buttons on the outer and inner triangles
